content: There's no creature that is loved by everyone, {A想象}but here on our planet, each and every lifeform has its own purpose and is irreplaceable.
info: 捕虫后露卡瓶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Ah, this jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> filled up while you were catching bugs. Here you are. Use it to water the Luca Seedling.

content: {A一愣}Just now, an insect came crawling past the Camp. Considering not every customer is fond of them, Glenn was quite worried it might end up in one of his boxes, hoho!

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the more you water the Luca Sapling, the more diverse our planet's ecosystem becomes. I wonder what surprises await us this time, hoho!
